attributes.additional_details: Shrewsbury & Telford Hospitals are considering once again in closing one of their departments this time the A & E, stating it is in consultation stage , I ask that you sign this petition to STOP any A & E closures around the UK including the Shropshire Hospitals as they are there to serve the people. I cannot believe with the increase of population they are even considering such a move. Please sign and say no more closures in our NHS service.
